file_content.text: So many options. Balmorran trip mines, Gormak turrets, neurotoxins from Quesh....
Usually I'm just a supplier. But I'll do anything to see a deal through.
Time to show my clients how it's done!
Like womp rats in a trap....
How would you like to die today?
Did that hurt? It should have.
I prefer hands-on demonstrations, don't you?
Plasma, ion, or carbonite? Why not all three?
Feel free to browse. Just watch where you step.
Even the Hutts won't touch some of my wares.
Found these babies on Ord Mantell. You like?
New from Czerka Corp. Tell me what you think!
Not even sure what this does. Let's find out!
Been saving this for a special occasion....
It's not over yet... still got a few tricks up my sleeve....
Doesn't matter... sold plenty of this stuff to the others... have fun....
